name: Grapple Prepare
description: Before your character chooses their action, if the character to which this is attached is your active character: Deal 3 Dendro DMG to the nearest opposing character.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Before your character chooses their action, if the character to which this is attached is your active character:</color> Deal 3 $[K107] to the nearest opposing character.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Before your character chooses their action, if the character to which this is attached is your active character:</color> Deal 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> to the nearest opposing character.
